commands.name: az devops service-endpoint azurerm create
commands.summary: Create an Azure RM type service endpoint.
commands.syntax:
az devops service-endpoint azurerm create --azure-rm-service-principal-id
                                          --azure-rm-subscription-id
                                          --azure-rm-subscription-name
                                          --azure-rm-tenant-id
                                          --name
                                          [--azure-rm-service-principal-certificate-path]
                                          [--detect {false, true}]
                                          [--org]
                                          [--project]
